Articles.Content:
is it bug?
and i still can accept contracts to saving kerbals from orbit

Hahaha! This isn't a bug. (Or at least I don't think it is.) You can put the complex over capacity while in the lower tiers with rescue contracts.

(If I recall correctly I had a career save with 30 some odd Kerbals while my capacity was only 12, I wish I had a screenie of that. Oh, and I was still getting more and more rescue contracts. I think I was only doing them at that point because I had a reliable rocket set up and it was pretty easy for me to just hop up into LKO and grab those poor sods, and bring em back. A quick, repeatable paycheck for my career save.

I'm sure a lot of people would complain if Squad patched this. Hiring Kerbs gets disgustingly expensive in the late game (when you have 10< Kerbals), especially when you need lots of kerbals to crew all your bases and stations, so rescue contracts are a nice way to get more, and sometimes add a bit of a challenge to that.

tl;dr. No, and this won't cause any save corruption or lost kerbals or anything, so don't worry. You just won't be able to hire anyone, obviously.

Edited January 21, 2016 by Kuansenhama
thanks a lot
